## EmbeddableFactory.isEditable property

Returns whether the current user should be allowed to edit this type of embeddable. Most of the time this should be based off the capabilities service, hence it's async.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly isEditable: () => Promise<boolean>;
```
